moves.name: Wrap
moves.description: A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: Lick
moves.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, it also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Poison Tail
moves.description: The user hits the target with its tail. It may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Venoshock
moves.description: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

moves.name: Glare
moves.description: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

moves.name: Poison Fang
moves.description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. It may also leave the target badly poisoned.

moves.name: Venom Drench
moves.description: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Gastro Acid
moves.description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

moves.name: Haze
moves.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

moves.name: Poison Jab
moves.description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Belch
moves.description: The user lets out a damaging belch on the target. The user must eat a Berry to use this move.

moves.name: Coil
moves.description: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

moves.name: Wring Out
moves.description: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater this attack's power.
